field.name: summary
field.value: Improved handling of empty strings, client valiator script tweaks

field.name: description
field.value:
The intent here is to standardize the handling of empty strings for certain validators (empty strings should be equivalent to null values), and to ensure client-side behavior mirrors server-side behavior. See http://groups.google.com/group/castle-project-devel/t/65eb489b5fad9baa for background info.
CHANGES: PrototypeWebValidator.cs updated to improve rendering of error messages (as discussed here: http://groups.google.com/group/castle-project-devel/t/c7baeb96941ec478)
FormHelper.resx updated to ensure empty strings return true for length and min/max validators.
SameAsValidator.cs and LengthValidator.cs updated to treat string.Empty values as null values. UNIT TESTS UPDATED TO REFLECT FUNCTIONAL CHANGES.
